name: Organigrow
description:
A Solo entry for LD52 - play as a farmer bot powered by ML.... Manual Labour

Use a variety of tools to Farm organs and deliver as many as you can in the time limit.

Explore to find seeds, tools and farmable areas - how many points can you get?

Don't forget to use the defib on those organs that don't want to mature!

CLEAR!! Controls
  • Move - WASD or Arrows
  • Sprint - Left Shift
  • Use Tool - Left Mouse
  • Throw Tool - Right Mouse
  • Jump - Space (Try Double Jumping)
  • Interact - 'E'
  • Switch tool mode -'Q'
Tools
  • Hoe - Left click to till the ground and make it ready for planting
  • Seedgun - Left click to fire seeds, aim at tilled ground - find seed jars for more seeds, use Q to change seeds
  • Defib - Hold Left click to help stubborn plants mature
  • Blower - Push and Pull Organs to the delivery hole, use Q to change mode
